title: The Contest
description: Andy and Jay are eating watermelon outside. They decide to have a watermelon seed-spitting contest. Whose seeds will go the farthest? Supportive pictures, repetitive phrases, and high-frequency words support early readers.
meta: contest, farther, mine, past, seed, spit
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Quotation Marks : Recognize and understand the use of quotation marks
Position Words : Recognize, understand, and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
